#Description of SensorScan5 solution

= SensorScan5 =

An experimental code to detect shakes/movements using a G-sensor (accelerometer).

For details see: 
[http://www.hjgode.de/wp/2011/02/13/mobile-development-shake-that-thing/ Blog article]

= Details =

This code is written for Intermec Sensor library. Needs to be adopted for other sensor devices like HTC Windows Mobile.
----
  * Needs Intermec device and libs if compiled with USE_SCANNER
  * Visual Studio 2008 SmartDevice C# solution
  * uses a modified perfChart class, original published at codeproject: [http://www.codeproject.com/KB/miscctrl/SimplePerfChart.aspx PerfChart Class]
